column3: Latest;There have been reports that the Chinese police captured a suspect who committed two murders in Sihanoukville
column5: through face recognition technology.------After the joint work between the Chinese and Cambodian police
column6: the two murders were finally attributed to the same man
column7: ------It is reported that the suspect is named Zhang. After a ------fatal shooting in May------ the suspect fled back to China. He later returned to Cambodia to continue committing crimes. On August 24
column8: he robbed and shot a man in a ------Sihanoukville hotel------ before again fleeing to China.------On October 12th
column9: the Chinese police successfully captured Zhang in China based on face recognition technology.------It is reported that both the Chinese and Cambodian police will question Zhang.------From CNE China correspondent.
